project_description: A Flutter project using the Stacked architecture, featuring routing, dependency injection, and dialog/bottom sheet management. The app provides an onboarding flow for a luxury chauffeur service called Gyde.
architecture_overview: The application follows the Stacked architecture with separate folders for app setup, features, UI components, and utilities. It uses Stacked for state management, routing, and dependency injection. The onboarding flow is implemented with multiple pages and sliding transitions.

files.name: lib/app/app.dart
files.description: Defines the app structure using StackedApp annotation for routes, dependencies, bottom sheets, and dialogs. It includes routes for the onboarding flow and services (BottomSheetService, DialogService, NavigationService). The file structure allows for easy addition of new services, routes, bottom sheets, and dialogs using the @stacked-import, @stacked-route, @stacked-service, @stacked-bottom-sheet, and @stacked-dialog annotations.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/welcome_page.dart
files.description: The welcome page of the onboarding flow, introducing the Gyde service.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/auth_options_page.dart
files.description: Page offering authentication options via phone or email.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/phone_input_page.dart
files.description: Page for entering the user's phone number for verification.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/verification_code_page.dart
files.description: Page for entering the verification code sent to the user's phone.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/email_collection_page.dart
files.description: Page for collecting the user's email address.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/welcome_confirmation_page.dart
files.description: Page confirming successful onboarding and welcoming the user.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/terms_conditions_page.dart
files.description: Page displaying the terms and conditions of the Gyde service.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: The entry point of the application. Sets up the app and runs it.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main function that runs the app

dependencies.name: stacked
dependencies.purpose: Stacked architecture for state management and routing

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
participant main
participant WelcomePage
participant AuthOptionsPage
participant PhoneInputPage
participant VerificationCodePage
participant EmailCollectionPage
participant WelcomeConfirmationPage
participant TermsConditionsPage

User -> main: Launch app
main -> WelcomePage: Show welcome page
User -> WelcomePage: Click 'Get Started'
WelcomePage -> AuthOptionsPage: Navigate
User -> AuthOptionsPage: Choose auth method
AuthOptionsPage -> PhoneInputPage: Navigate if phone
User -> PhoneInputPage: Enter phone number
PhoneInputPage -> VerificationCodePage: Navigate
User -> VerificationCodePage: Enter code
VerificationCodePage -> EmailCollectionPage: Navigate
User -> EmailCollectionPage: Enter email
EmailCollectionPage -> WelcomeConfirmationPage: Navigate
User -> WelcomeConfirmationPage: View confirmation
WelcomeConfirmationPage -> TermsConditionsPage: Navigate
User -> TermsConditionsPage: View terms
@enduml
state_management_flow: State is managed using the Stacked architecture. ViewModels handle the business logic and state for their respective views. The app.locator.dart file sets up dependency injection, while app.router.dart manages navigation between views.
navigation_flow: The application starts with main.dart, which sets up the app and runs the WelcomePage. The onboarding flow progresses through multiple pages with sliding transitions, managed by the Stacked Router defined in app.router.dart. After onboarding, the user can access the main app functionality.
